data.projectdescription: I've made Telegram bot for Allur company's HR. The bot helps the employees getting information via bot commands that send HR documents ğŸ“ and forms ğŸ“ƒ.

This web application notifies via email all subscribers if rain is forecasted to happen in the selected city. The client-side is made at React.JS (Vite + Material UI). Server-side is made at Node.JS (Express.JS + MongoDB).
